ingredients.name: small sweet onion, peeled and diced

instructions:
1. Mince garlic
  2. chop onion
  3. Mince half of the sage
  4. Peel squash and cut into 1 inch cubes
  5. Toss with onion, garlic, sage, olive oil, salt and pepper.
  6. Spread squash over baking sheet and roast for 40 minutes at 375.
Source: http://www.thekitchn.com/recipe-pasta-with-butternut-sq-64966
